Name: Lucky Of Love
About the game: Lucky Of Love is a puzzle game. You just need to turn the turntable, lose a bomb, win a fortune, and unlock all the pictures quickly. There are no time or level restrictions in the game. The intention is to let you enjoy a relaxed experience. Game features 1. Exquisite CG pictures 2. Funny play 3. Real Japanese Girl Voice
